content: Is a new mass extinction coming? Everything leads me to fear that the damned war industry is about to achieve, with its sinister nuclear arsenal, the stupid goal of extinguishing life on Earth.
translations: ita:È in arrivo una nuova estinzione di massa﹖ Tutto mi porta a temere che la maledetta industria bellica stia per raggiunge
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
